mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hotgoods ( hotgoods_id, goods_id, sort_id, is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version ) values (#{hotGoodsId}, #{goodsId}, #{sortId}, #{isDeleted}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.select:
select b.sort_id sortId, b.goods_id goodsId, a.goods_name goodsName, a.sales_price price, a.goods_intro goodsIntroduce, b.hotgoods_id hotGoodsId, b.version from t_sys_goodsinfo a, t_sys_hotgoods b where b.is_deleted = 0 and a.goods_id = b.goods_id
and a.goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and b.goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')
order by b.sort_id desc

select a.goods_id goodsId, a.goods_name goodsName, b.class_name classOne, c.class_name classTwo, a.goods_status goodsStatus FROM t_sys_goodsinfo a, t_sys_goodsclassification b, t_sys_goodsclassification c where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.goods_status = 1 and a.class_one_id = b.class_id and a.class_two_id = c.class_id
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')
and goods_id not in (select goods_id from t_sys_hotgoods)

SELECT a.sort_id sortId, b.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_name goodsName, a.hotgoods_id hotGoodsId, a.version FROM t_sys_hotgoods a LEFT JOIN t_sys_goodsinfo b ON a.is_deleted = 0 AND b.goods_id = a.goods_id HAVING a.hotgoods_id = #{hotGoodsId}
mapper.update: update t_sys_hotgoods set goods_id = #{goodsId}, sort_id = #{sortId}, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where sort_id = #{sortId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select value showCnt, version from t_sys_region where id = '9999'
mapper.update: update t_sys_region set value = #{showCnt}, version = version + 1, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy} where id = '9999' and version = #{version}

update t_sys_hotgoods set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now(), last_modified_by = #{userCode}, version = version + 1 where hotgoods_id in
#{item}
